name: Purplemoon for Android
body:
The official Android app for [Purplemoon](https://www.purplemoon.ch), the Switzerland-based network for LGBT and friends.

# Download
[Download on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ch.defiant.purplesky)

# Questions
Have any questions about the app? See the FAQ or [contact us](mailto:purplesky.android@gmail.com).
If you have questions or issues regarding Purplemoon itself, please see the [Purplemoon support page](https://www.purplemoon.ch/contact).

# Contribute
Want to file a bug? [See issues or file a new one](https://github.com/padyx/purplemoon-android/issues)
This app is Open Source - you can have a look at our source code or contribute at our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/padyx/purplemoon-android).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
